metadata.dc:author: Gomez Duaso, A J
Hernandez Moro, B
Esparza Gomez, G
Seoane Leston, J M
Sanz Asenjo, A
metadata.dc:description: Two cases of herpetic intraoral infection, in inmunodepressed patients, are presented. We emphasize its diagnosis and therapeutical aspects. A bibliographic review is done.
metadata.dc:title: Infección oral por herpes virus en pacientes inmunodeprimidos: presentación de 2 casos. Revisión de la literatura.
[Oral herpes virus infection in immunodepressed patients: presentation of 2 cases. Review of the literature].
